Pre-Game Insights: Former NBA champions Golden State Warriors will start their NBA 2024-25 season with an away game at Portland.
The Portland Trail Blazers vs Golden State Warriors game will be played at the iconic Moda Center and will have many exciting matchups.
In the offseason moves, Klay Thompson parted ways with the Golden State Warriors, and the franchise filled in the gap with another sharp-shooter in Buddy Hield.
Portland Trail Blazers are focused on developing talent along with some experienced players to give them a potent lineup.
In head-to-head matchups against the Warriors, the Portland-based franchise lost all four matches in the last season and will look for a positive start in the new season.
